prompt:
Image Prompt:
Create an illustration depicting a diverse group of Christian MPs engaging in a heated discussion within the walls of the UK Parliament, with prominent visuals of intelligent design (ID) concepts subtly integrated into the background. The scene should convey a sense of collaboration, debate, and lobbying efforts for the inclusion of ID in education policy. Include symbolic elements such as textbooks with ID content, scientific diagrams merging with biblical imagery, and Christian-themed decor to emphasize the intersection of faith and science in policy influence.
